home.homeHeroAboutTitle: Reliable metal structures for residential and industrial needs.
home.homeHeroAboutSubtitle: We specialize in manufacturing and installing gates, balconies, railings, welded frames, and fully customized metal projects. With over 30 years of experience, in-house production and precision craftsmanship ‚Äî we deliver quality you can trust.
home.homeHeroAdvantagesText1: We‚Äôve been working in the field of metal structures for over 30 years, delivering reliable and functional solutions for both residential and commercial projects. We specialize in gates, balconies, railings, frames, and fully customized structures based on client designs.
home.homeHeroAdvantagesText2: Our team consists of experienced craftsmen, engineers, and installers who are true experts in their work. Every project is carried out with strict attention to quality, precision, and safety standards.
home.homeHeroAdvantagesText3: We operate our own production facilities equipped with modern tools and proven technologies, allowing us to implement even the most complex technical solutions ‚Äî on time and without compromise.
home.homeHeroStep1Subtitle: We carefully study your needs, technical requirements, and design preferences to prepare a fully customized project proposal that fits your vision, budget, and timeline.
home.homeHeroStep2Subtitle: We formalize every important detail through a clear and comprehensive agreement, ensuring mutual understanding, transparency, and a foundation for a smooth and trusted collaboration.
home.homeHeroStep3Subtitle: Our expert team manufactures each component using top-grade materials and cutting-edge technologies, followed by professional on-site installation with strict quality and safety compliance.
home.homeHeroStep4Subtitle: After a final thorough inspection, we hand over the completed project, ensuring everything meets the agreed standards and leaving you completely satisfied with the final result.

catalog.catalogHeaderSubtitle: In this section, you will find examples of our completed projects - balconies, gates, railings, and other metal structures.
catalog.catalogHeaderSubtitle2: Each product is made to meet individual customer needs and modern quality standards.

balconies.balconiesTitle: Custom metal structures for complex architectural fa√ßade solutions
balconies.balconiesSubtitle: We produce metal balconies for new construction and renovations. Reliable solutions with custom dimensions, design, and technical detailing.
balconies.balconiesInfoSubtitle: Our company specializes in manufacturing metal balconies for various types of properties ‚Äî from private houses and cottages to multi-storey residential buildings and commercial developments. We collaborate with both developers and private clients, tailoring each design to specific architectural and technical requirements.
balconies.balconiesInfoSubtitle1: All balcony systems are built with a focus on safety, durability, and aesthetics. We offer a full range of services ‚Äî from design to installation ‚Äî and can also produce balconies without installation, based on customer-provided blueprints or sketches.
balconies.balconiesInfoSubtitle2: Thanks to our professional approach and years of experience, we deliver solutions that combine reliability, a modern appearance, and compliance with European quality standards.

railings.railingsTitle: Reliable safety systems for staircases, terraces, and public environments
railings.railingsSubtitle: Durable steel railings for residential and public use. Focus on safety, precision workmanship, and architectural compatibility in every project.

gates.gatesTitle: Engineered access control solutions ‚Äî convenience, automation, protection
gates.gatesSubtitle: Design and installation of manual or automated gates for private and commercial facilities. Tailored functionality and strong structural integrity.

aboutUs.aboutUsCompanyInfoText: Timalex-Metal is a company with experience and reliability in the field of metal structures. We have been operating in the market for over 30 years, specializing in the manufacture of balcony railings, gates, railings, and custom-made structures of any complexity.
aboutUs.aboutUsCompanyInfoExperienceText: Our specialists are professionals with many years of experience. Each project goes through several stages: measurements, design, manufacturing, and installation. We always take into account the individual requirements of the client and offer the best technical solutions.
aboutUs.aboutUsCompanyInfoProductionText: Our production is equipped with everything necessary for metal processing with millimeter precision. Thanks to this, we can produce both standard designs and non-standard products according to customer drawings.
aboutUs.whatWeDoSubtitle: We specialize in manufacturing a wide range of metal products: from classic gates and balconies to complex welded structures and frames for industrial and residential needs.

aboutUs.aboutQualityNote: Every structure is the result of coordinated work by craftsmen, engineers, and installation teams. Our goal is not just to build ‚Äî but to deliver metal solutions that last for years.

contact.contactHeaderSubtitle: We are open to cooperation and ready to answer all your questions. Here you can find our contact information and leave a request for a callback. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.contactFooterText: We look forward to connecting with you and building a long-term partnership. Thank you for your interest in our company.
contact.formReceivedText: Thank you for your submission. We will process it as soon as possible. A duplicate submission is not required, as the form has already been successfully submitted from this device.

footer.footerSubtitle: Manufacturing and installation of metal structures since 1993. We work on individual and standard projects.
